document_data.name: Bui
document_data.mainbody: '''Bui the Hog''' was a gambler. In {{yearlink|1374}}, she played [[Three-Dragon Ante]] against [[Warian Datharathi]], [[Yasha]], and [[Shem]] somewhere north of [[Cathyr]] in [[Dambrath]], but went too deep into debt to continue throughout the evening. Before Warian was able to claim the accumulated pot, she taunted him and then attacked him with a broken chair leg; after Yasha restrained him, he discovered the powers of his [[plangent]] arm. He freed himself from Yasha and struck Bui down. To the gambler's judgement, Bui may have had [[orc]]ish blood or been a northern [[berserker]].{{cite book/Darkvision|20-25|3}}
